name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D LIVE CONCERT】J-RAP in JIGOKU! + NEW 3D MODEL REVEAL! #JRAPinJIGOKU [dN7gTC10XLE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope talks with Fuwawa and Mococo about their musical roots and influences.
A narrative cinematic segment detailing Mori Calliope's back story and journey to Japan.
Mori Calliope and Pavolia Reine perform 'The Ability to Move an Audience'.
scenes.song_name: The Ability to Move an Audience
